billingUpdateError: Unable to update billing profiles at this time. Please try again later.
makeDefault: Make this my default billing profile.
movePrepubOrders: Move all pending Pre-Pub orders to this card.
movePreorders: Move all pending Preorders to this card.
movePaymentPlans: Move all outstanding payment plans to this card.
moveSubscriptions: Move all current subscriptions to this card.
fetchStates: fetch states for a given country
fetchAddressFormat: fetch address format for a given country
beforeRemoving: Before removing your card, be sure to:
moveSubscriptionsToAlternate: Cancel or move current subscriptions to an alternate credit card.
movePaymentPlansToAlternate: Move outstanding payment plans to an alternate credit card.
movePreordersToAlternate: Cancel or move pre-orders to an alternate credit card.
movePrepubsToAlternate: Cancel or move pre-pub orders to an alternate credit card.
